metadata.description: Professional Claude Code plugins for software development and education
metadata.author: Daniel Senften

plugins.name: git-workflow
plugins.description: Professional git workflow with automated pre-commit checks, emoji conventional commits, PR management, and comprehensive references. Includes professional-commit-workflow and professional-pr-workflow skills.

plugins.name: project-management
plugins.description: Comprehensive project management with PRD generation, project planning, task implementation, Linear integration, and git worktree workflow

plugins.name: code-quality
plugins.description: Code review, refactoring, and quality checks for maintaining high standards

plugins.name: education
plugins.description: Teaching aids, code explanations, and student support for IT education

plugins.name: tf-core
plugins.description: Comprehensive development utilities with 8 commands and 3 expert agents for plugin/command/agent development, validation, CI automation, and project initialization
